tasks.label: Launch: Livox (MID360) - PointCloud2 Livox
args: xterm -hold -e bash -lc "source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && mkdir -p /tmp/livox_launch && sed \"s/xfer_format   = 1/xfer_format   = 0/\" livox_ros_driver2/launch_ROS2/msg_MID360_launch.py > /tmp/livox_launch/msg_MID360_xfer0_launch.py && ros2 launch /tmp/livox_launch/msg_MID360_xfer0_launch.py user_config_path:=${workspaceFolder}/src/livox_ros_driver2/config/MID360_config.json"
tasks.detail: Runs Livox driver with xfer_format=0 (PointCloud2 PointXYZRTL - Livox extended)

tasks.label: Launch: Livox RViz (MID360)
args: DISPLAY=:3 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority xterm -hold -e bash -lc "source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch livox_ros_driver2 rviz_MID360_launch.py user_config_path:=${workspaceFolder}/src/livox_ros_driver2/config/MID360_config.json"
tasks.detail: Runs Livox driver and RViz in xterm on DISPLAY :3; uses the MID360 config.

tasks.label: Launch: RQT Image View
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && DISPLAY=:3 XAUTHORITY=$HOME/.Xauthority ros2 run rqt_image_view rqt_image_view
tasks.detail: Runs rqt_image_view directly on DISPLAY :3 to visualize camera/image topics

tasks.label: Launch: RealSense D435
args: source /opt/ros/humble/setup.bash && source install/setup.bash && ros2 launch realsense2_camera rs_launch.py
tasks.detail: Launches Intel RealSense D435 camera driver with default configuration
